ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mask of the Songbird
ygData.msgSnippet: It is the light woolen mask for the Mask of the Songbird quest.  I have had one forever, been waiting to get the dang Statuette.  The mask dropped of one of
ygData.messageBody:
It is the light woolen mask for the Mask of the Songbird quest. I have had
one forever, been waiting to get the dang Statuette. The mask dropped of
one of the bosses on the third isle if I remember right. The Statuette I
have heard is supposed to drop of the Spiroc Lord (which has been broken the
every time we have killed him, no loot).

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
> Sent: Monday, November 13, 2000 8:36 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Mask of the Songbird
>
>
> The only web sites I can find that list the components for
> the Plane of
> Sky Mask of the Songbird Quest show: Ocher Tessara, Songbird
> Statuette,
>
> Light Woolen MANTLE. Now, the Light Woolen Mantle is also used in the
> Songweaver's Mantle quest, and I have seen some posts that
> suggest that
> this is a typo, and that what is required is a Light Woolen MASK.
>
> Have any of you completed this quest, and if so, what object
> is needed?
> And do you remember which MOB(s) dropped it? I heard it's the
> Shimmering Meteors, which my guild never does because of their really
> annoying knockback effect. I hate to ask my guild to try killing them
> if it's pointless.
>
> So far, we've never seen a Light Woolen anything.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 54 songs, Innoruuk
>
> PS - Does anyone have a link to anyplace that lists all of the Sky
> components and the quests they're for?
>
>
